subject: Regarding Opening of single bid received in 3rd call after no response in first two calls
text: HRy <efy <THTf xifeasrut Qh19 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a 4dr7 a_{TTHTf HTT4) Wav / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 @ 6, #er-10, ERGT, T ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Opening of Bid /2019 No. 18.34/2019, Dated the 29#March, 2019 [Decision taken by the Authority in its 136th meeting held on 21.02.2019 at Agenda Item No. 136.02] Sub: Opening of Single bid received in 3rd call after no response in first two calls- Authority in its 136th meeting held on 21.02.2019 discussed a situation where no bid was received in 1st and 2nd calls and a single bid was received in 3rd call. 2_ The following has been decided by the Authority for above stated scenario of call of bids: In case no bids are received after 1st call/2nd call, the reasons for poor response to the bid should be analysed by reviewing the bidding conditions, after each call, in order to see whether there were any conditions restricting the competition and appropriate modifications be made to the bidding documents/conditions before going for next call of bids_ (ii) Even after taking all measures for making the bidding conditions competitive, if single bid is received in the 3rd call, it may be opened and examined for its reasonableness and reasons recorded in writing before considering for award. 3_ The approval of award shall be done as per policy guideline NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Delegation of Power /2017 No. 18.24/2017 dated 21.08.2017 and its subsequent amendments, if any. 4_ All Technical Divisions / ROs / PDs shall ensure the   compliance of Authority' s decision stated in para 2 above: ^1)o> (V.K.
